task_info.description: WooCommerce registration platform for running clubs in Quebec

task_description:
https://grandclubdecourse.ca/

Actual registration platform:
https://athleticsreg.ca/#!/series/grand-club-de-course-automne-2025

Evaluation to create a transactional platform for running club registrations using WooCommerce.

The organization currently uses a third-party platform to manage registrations for its running club.

We would like to evaluate the possibility of using WooCommerce to manage registrations.

There are 46 running clubs across the province of Quebec.

On the platform we want to create, we would like to improve the search for the club closest to customers using the postal code or another method.

Questions and specific features of the current registration form:

Each club must indicate the name of the coach and their specific schedule.

Parent's first name
Parent's last name
Parent's email address
Parent's phone number
Full mailing address

Second parent's first name
Second parent's last name
Second parent's email address
Second parent's phone number

Child's first name
Child's last name
Child's age at the start of the session
Date of birth

Questions:

What is the child's history of participation in the GRAND running club? (1st session, 2nd session, 3rd session, etc.)
Allergies
Health issues
T-shirt size
How did you hear about us?

Option to purchase additional items / Store

Promotional code that applies when a parent registers 2 or more children: 10% off each additional registration
Promotional codes with a fixed amount or percentage
Partial or full refunds

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
task_comments: @Sunilsinh Gohil Please review the details shared by the client and provide your feedback, feasibility assessment, and estimated effort for this task.
@Parth Gohel I will check and share a quote by tomorrow EOD.
